name: wordpress-multisite-recaptcha
description: A WordPress plugin to add [Google's Recaptcha](https://www.google.com/recaptcha) on every site on a multisite environment.

scripts.build: composer install --no-dev && composer dumpautoload -o && cross-env NODE_ENV=production gulp build
scripts.compress: composer install --no-dev && composer dumpautoload -o && cross-env NODE_ENV=production gulp compress
